amendment.description: To create a deficit-neutral reserve for asbestos reform legislation.

vote.text: Amendment SA 613 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 613 proposed by Senator Specter. (consideration: CR S3678-3679) To create a deficit-neutral reserve for asbestos reform legislation.
